name:
Castle Conqueror
(English Version)
description:
Castle Conqueror is a real-time strategy game for casual gamers. You play a commander who must resist the enemy empire and save the lives of the people. Lead your soldiers into battle, seize the enemyâ€™s castle and win victories until you destroy the empire on the mainland!

There are 5 chapters in total, each containing 10 stages. The male and female commander use different effective cards. The Gold cards you receive after winning a stage can be used to upgrade your attributes or to buy items.

In-game text will be in English.
